configuration.title: PHP Code Beautifier and Fixer Configuration options

phpcbf.executablePath.description: Points to the phpcbf exectuable, eg: win: phpcbf.bat, other: phpcbf

phpcbf.standard.description: null, PSR1, PSR2, Symfony, WordPress etc. You can also point to a phpcs.xml rules file, eg: /file/path/phpcs.xml

phpcbf.onsave.description: Run PHP Code Beautifier and Fixer on save

phpcbf.documentFormattingProvider.description: Register PHP document formatting provider, right mouse-click context menu, show as 'Format Document', after changing this option you should restart your editor.

phpcbf.enable.description: This setting controls whether phpcbf formatter is enabled.

phpcbf.debug.description: Write phpcbf stdout to the console
